Articles.Content: i was messing around with mods in ckan and i installed spectra and all its addons (except the snow one) i removed the things it told me to remove and i played the game. it was laggy and i didnt really like it that much so i removed it and the addons to it and i added back like the eve stock planet configs and the scatterer ones. i launched the game again and randomly the game would lag for a few seconds even in the vab. so that was yesterday and today i launched garrys mod and btw garrys mod never lags on my computer but this time it was doing the same thing it was in ksp. btw i have a acer nitro five and i just got it in february and it barley lags (i have a intel i5 and a rtx 3060) (i might have figured out why so my parents are divorced so the law or something like says we get to go to my mothers house for mothers day and i forgot my brothers bag-and we have the same computer-and my brothers bag has his charger and i brought my charger and so i gave my charger to him so i have to use my moms charger which is different but it still works and the nitro sense thing the computer comes with says it needs the correct charger for fine fan control)
